message.body: Hi Gabi, regarding Hugo's email it's up to you. I'd rather have original music, but you could get inspiration from the ones he mentioned? Totally up to you of course
Cool, id prefer original music too. Ive got a spooky intro already. Ill try to capture the elements that Hugo is looking for in terms of danceability
Me too. Should we meet tonight with just Phinn?
The venue issue is still bothering me. Theres gotta be some big industrial space that we could convert into a theatre ourselves, like the garage at speaking volumes or something in the south end
Richard and I are taking the tango class tonight...so I will be with Phinn anyway
Yes, lets. Phinn is taking tango too?
The class is at his space
Ill be at a rehearsal until 9 or 930
Ok I will see if he can do 9:30
I def can't do Thursday. Maybe tomorrow but it would need to be after 9
